thread.title: Jessa Duggar Reveals Plans to Expand Her Family Even Further
thread.title_full: Jessa Duggar Reveals Plans to Expand Her Family Even Further

title: Jessa Duggar Reveals Plans to Expand Her Family Even Further
text:
Jessa Duggar Reveals Plans to Expand Her Family Even Further Jenny Erikson 
TLC Their second baby is due any second now, but Ben and Jessa (Duggar) Seewald are already talking about expanding their family again. The Counting On stars revealed their plans to add more kiddos to their growing brood, and it looks like they're going to have one very full house. 
In an interview with PEOPLE magazine, Jessa revealed, "Ben and I still have a deep desire to adopt, and it's something we continue to look into ... We've also talked about fostering to adopt." 
More from CafeMom: Jessa Duggar Admits Being Unprepared for Baby #2 
Ben and Jessa have been vocal since before they even tied the knot in 2014 about wanting to adopt someday, but plans got put on hold when they got pregnant right away with Spurgeon. The little guy is now 15 months old, and due to become a big brother any day now. 
The soon-to-be mom of two revealed that they have dreams of "many future babies," but no word on if they plan on having a full 19 like her parents Jim Bob and Michelle did. But before they add anymore kiddos to the family, they're going to have to find some new digs. 
More from CafeMom: Jessa Duggar's New Bump Pic Shows She Doesn't Have Long to Go 
Jessa said of their current living situation, "We're already going to have two babies in a two-bedroom house. So I'm thinking, we'll have to upgrade to a three-bedroom." 
They're definitely going to need some more space before they decide to expand their family again -- whether it's biologically or through adoption. They seem like such cool and relaxed parents though, we can't wait to see them with more than one precious kiddo.
